bill.title: City of Vicksburg; authorize a sales tax to pay for a sports complex and/or recreational facility and related facilities.
bill.description: An Act To Authorize The Governing Authorities Of The City Of Vicksburg, Mississippi, To Levy A Special Sales Tax At The Rate Of 1/2 Of 1% Upon The Gross Proceeds Of Sales Or Gross Income Of Businesses In The City Derived From Any Of The Activities Taxed At The Rate Of 7% Or More Under The Mississippi Sales Tax Law To Provide Funds For A State-of-the-art Sports Complex And/or Recreational Facility And Related Facilities; To Authorize The City To Issue General Obligation Bonds In An Aggregate Principal Amount Of Not To Exceed $20,000,000.00 To Be Expended To Purchase Property For, And For The Construction Of, A Sports Complex And/or Recreational Facility And Other Related Facilities; To Provide For An Election On Whether The Tax May Be Levied; To Provide For The Tax To Be Discontinued Under Certain Circumstances; And For Related Purposes.
